discussion.author: proux01
discussion.comment:
Should we also remove older deprecations? Grep gives:
* deprecated in 1.11: 22
* deprecated in 1.12: 151
* deprecated in 1.13: 22
* deprecated in 1.14: 1

It feels strange to me to only remove one thing out of 22 in the 1.13 list and keep the remaining?

discussion.author: affeldt-aist
discussion.comment:
> It feels strange to me to only remove one thing out of 22 in the 1.13 list and keep the remaining?

You're right. Let's do that as part of this PR. I'll do that ASAP.
